content.description:
Stand start with a hands matched high on the undercling feature. From there, gain your footing, reach and match on a great edge above, and continue through pockets/edges to the lip and an easy mantel.

The sit goes as well and maybe adds a grade and some interesting movement.
content.protection: A pad or two. The landing is perfect though.
content.location: It climbs the west face of Sunblock.

content.description: Stand start with a high, right hand undercling. From there, gain the rail above, make a big move to a two-finger slot at the bottom of the sloper-hueco, reach the lip, and mantel atop the boulder.
content.protection: A pair of pads. There is a great landing.
content.location: It climbs the boulder's west face.

content.description: Start with a right hand on an amazing side pull and left hand on a good hold directly underneath, or on a slopey side pull out left (doesn't make a difference). Pull on and do a large precision move to a good slot crimp. Move up from there using good holds.
content.location: North side of the boulder. You can't miss the starting sidepull.

content.description: Stand start with a good left hand sidepull and a small sloper-bump (it's contrived, see start beta photo). From there, climb through edges to reach a featured finish.
content.protection: A pair of pads. The landing is clear and flat.
content.location: It climbs the west side of Sunblock's northwest arete.

content.description: Sit start matched on the edge. From there, move up on edges to reach an easy mantel.
content.protection: Three pads, ideally. The landing has a rock on the left portion that may spoil your day.
content.location: It climbs the east face of Sunblock.

content.description:
A couple of difficult Â compression moves with bad feet lead to a tricky-to-navigate top.

If anyone knows of a name or previous ascent, please do not hesitate to let me know!
content.location: Sit start with opposing sidepulls (right hand on the arete and left hand on a sloping edge) and a right heel hook, Do some powerful moves to get to the friendly incuts that take you to the top.
